bundle_it.properties.text.link.trello.description: Scheda ufficiale trello per funzionalit pianificate
bundle_it.properties.text.link.itch.io.description: pagina di itch.io con download per PC e versione web
bundle_it.properties.text.linkfail: Impossibile aprire il link! L'URL  stato copiato nella tua bacheca.
bundle_it.properties.text.sector.gameover: Hai perso questo settore. Attaccare di nuovo?
bundle_it.properties.text.level.delete.title: Conferma Eliminazione
bundle_it.properties.text.map.delete: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare questa mappa"[accent]{0}[]"?
bundle_it.properties.text.construction.desktop: Desktop controls have been changed.\nTo deselect a block or stop building, [accent]use space[].
bundle_it.properties.text.construction.title: Guida blocchi da costruzione
bundle_it.properties.text.construction:
Hai appena selezzionato la [accent]modalit di distruzione blocchi[].

Per iniziare a piazzare, clicca in intorno appa tua navicella
Una volta che sei soddisfatto del posizionamento, premi il conferma(), e la tua navicella inizier a costruire il tutto.

- [accentRimuovi i blocck[] dalla selezione cliccandoci sopra.
- [accent]Sposta la selezione[] tenendo premuto e trascinando il tutto sullo schermo
- [accent]Piazza i blocchi in linea[] Tenendo premuto nel punto d'inizio e poi trascinando il tutto nella direzione desiderata.
- [accent]Cancella la selezione[] premendo la X in basso a sinistra.
bundle_it.properties.text.deconstruction.title: Guida distruzione blocchi
bundle_it.properties.text.deconstruction:
Hai appena selezionato la [accent]modalit di distruzione [].

Per iniziare a distruggere, premi sui blocchi interessati.
 Poi premi conferma(), e la tua navicella inizier A INIZIARE

- [accent]Rimuovi i blocchi[] dalla tua selezione cliccandoci sopra.
- [accent]Per rimuovere pi blocchi in un area[] tieni premuto in un punto, poi trascina in modo da selexionare ci che ti interessa.
- [accent]Cancella la distruzione[] premendo la X in basso a sinistra.
bundle_it.properties.text.sector.abandon.confirm: Are you sure you want to abandon all progress at this sector?\nThis cannot be undone!
bundle_it.properties.text.name: Nome:
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.sectorComplete.text: La tua misione  completata.\nOra il server continuer al settore successivo.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.clientOutdated: Versione del client obsoleta! Aggiorna il tuo gioco!
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Server obsoleto! Chiedi all'host di aggiornare!
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.recentKick: Sei stato cacciato di recente.\nAspetta prima di riconnetterti.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.nameInUse: C' gi qualcuno con il tuo nome\nsu questo server.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.nameEmpty: Il tuo nome deve contenere almeno un carattere.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.idInUse: Sei gi su questo server! Non  permesso connettersi con due account.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.kicked.customClient: Questo server non supporta le build personalizzate. Scarica la versione ufficiale dal sito.
bundle_it.properties.text.host.info:
Il pulsante [accent]hos [] ospita un server sulle porte [scarlet]6567[] e [scarlet]656.[] Chiunque sulla stessa [LIGHT_GRAY]connessione wifi o rete locale[] dovrebbe essere in grado di vedere il proprio server nel proprio elenco server.

 Se vuoi che le persone siano in grado di connettersi ovunque tramite IP,  richiesto il [accent]port forwarding[]. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: se qualcuno sta riscontrando problemi durante la connessione al gioco LAN, assicurati di aver consentito a Mindustry di accedere alla rete locale nelle impostazioni del firewall.
bundle_it.properties.text.join.info:
Qui  possibile inserire un [accent]IP del server[] a cui connettersi, o scoprire [accento]un server sulla rete locale[] disponibile.
 Sono supportati sia il multiplayer LAN che WAN. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: non esiste un elenco di server globali automatici; se si desidera connettersi a qualcuno tramite IP,  necessario chiedere all'host il proprio IP.
bundle_it.properties.text.invalidid: ID client non valido! Invia una segnalazione di bug.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.bans.none: Nessun giocatore bandito trovato! Finora tutto liscio.
bundle_it.properties.text.server.delete: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare questo server?

bundle_it.properties.item.stone.name: pietra
bundle_it.properties.item.stone.description: UN materiale grezzo molto comune, che solitamente viene rifinito per ottenerne degli altri.
bundle_it.properties.item.copper.name: Rame
bundle_it.properties.item.copper.description: Una utile materiale styrutturale. Molto usato in tutti i blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.name: Piombo
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.description: Un materiale base, molto usato nei blocchi di trasporto.
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.name: carbone
bundle_it.properties.item.coal.description: Un carburante comune e facilmente ottenibile.
bundle_it.properties.item.dense-alloy.name: LEga ad alta densit
bundle_it.properties.item.dense-alloy.description: Una lega molto pesante composta da piombo e rame. utilizzato in blocchi di trasporto e trapani avanzati.
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.name: titanio
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.description: Un raro metallo super leggero usato ampiamente nel trasporto di liquidi, trapani e navi.
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.name: Torio
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.description: Un materiale denso e radioattivo, utilizzato nella costruzione di strutture e come carburante del reattore nucleare.
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicio
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.description: Un semiconduttore molto utile che viene utilizzato nei pannelli solari e nei macchinari elettronici.
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastaniu
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.description: Un materiale leggero e duttile, utilizzato nelle navi avanzete e come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_it.properties.item.biomatter.name: Biomateria
bundle_it.properties.item.biomatter.description: Materiale organico; Utilizzato per essere convertito in petrolio o carburante.
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.name: sabbia
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.description: Un materiale base che viene altamente usato nei processi di fusione, Sia come lega che come lubrificante.
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Polvere esplosiva
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un composto altamente volatile, utilizzato nella produzione di bombe ed esplosivi. Pu essere utilizzato come combustibile anche se non  consigliato.
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pirite
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.description: Una sostanza molto infiammabile che viene utilizzata nelle armi a fuoco.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.name: acqua
bundle_it.properties.liquid.lava.name: lava
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.name: petrolio
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: criogenium
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Il mech standard.  abbastanza veloce e produce abbastanza danni; pu anche generare 3 droni per aumentare il suo danno complessivo.
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Un veloce, poco armato mech fatto per giocare a tocca e fuga con il nemico. Fa poco danno alle strutture, ma pu uccidere un gran nummero di nemici grazie alle sue armi ad alto voltaggio.
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Un mach di supporto. Cura i blocchi danneggiati sparandogli contro. Pu spegnere fuochi e curare i compagni di squadra.
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Un ingombrante e ben armato mech, fatto per stare in prima linea. La sue difese possono bloccare fino al 90% dei danni.
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Una navicella standard. Molto veloce e leggera, ma pu minare pochi blocchi e ha scarse potenzialit nella difesa.
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Una navetta da tocca e fuga. Anche se inizialmente lenta, pu accellerare ad alte velocit e voloare sopra gli avamposti dei nemici, pu provocare molti danni ai nemici tramite l'utilizzo di fulmini o missili.
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Tridente
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Un bombardiere pesante. Gistamente ben protetto.
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Una grande e ben armata macchina da guerra. Equipaggiato con ripetitore di fiamma e con alta accellerazione e velocit massima.

bundle_it.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.name: Pericolo
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.description: Un unit terrena base, molto pi efficiente se in branco.
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.name: Titano
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.description: Un'unit di terra corazzata avanzata. Utilizza carburo come munizione. Attacca sia bersagli terrestri che aerei.
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.

bundle_it.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.
bundle_it.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall-large.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_it.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_it.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_it.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_it.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_it.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_it.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_it.properties.block.smelter.description: Burns coal for smelting copper and lead into dense alloy.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc-smelter.description: Smelts copper and lead into dense alloy by using an external power source.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_it.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_it.properties.block.solidifer.description: Cools lava to stone at a fast pace.
bundle_it.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_it.properties.block.biomattercompressor.description: Compresses biomatter in order to retrieve oil.
bundle_it.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_it.properties.block.centrifuge.description: More efficient than the separator, but also more expensive to build and requires power.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_it.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_it.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_it.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_it.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_it.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_it.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_it.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_it.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_it.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_it.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.dart-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a basic fighter aircraft.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_it.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.command-center.description: Allows changing friendly AI behavior. Currently, attack, retreat and patrol commands are supported.
bundle_it.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_it.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.alpha-mech-pad.description: When given enough power, rebuilds your ship into the[accent] Alpha[] mech.
bundle_it.properties.block.itemvoid.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.block.powervoid.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.lava.description: Can be transformed into[LIGHT_GRAY] stone[], used for generating power or used as ammo for certain turrets.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_pl.properties.text.link.trello.description: Oficjalna tablica Trello z planowanym funkcjami
bundle_pl.properties.text.link.itch.io.description: Strona itch.io z oficjanymi wersjami do pobrania
bundle_pl.properties.text.linkfail: Nie udao si otworzy linku!\nURL zosta skopiowany.
bundle_pl.properties.text.sector.gameover: This sector has been lost. Re-deploy?
bundle_pl.properties.text.level.delete.title: Potwierd usuwanie
bundle_pl.properties.text.construction.desktop: Desktop controls have been changed.\nTo deselect a block or stop building, [accent]use space[].
bundle_pl.properties.text.construction.title: Poradnik tworzenia blokw
bundle_pl.properties.text.construction:
Wybrae [accent]tryb tworzenia blokw[].

Aby zacz stawia bloki, po prostu kliknij na dostpne pole obok twojego statku.
Kiedy wybrae kilka blokw, kliknij ptaszek i twj statek zacznie budowa bloki.

- [accent]Anuluj bloki[] z twojej kolekcji przez klikanie ich(?).
- [accent]Przesuwaj bloki w kolekcji[] przez przeciganie ich w opowiednim kierunku.
- [accent]Stawiaj bloki w lini[] przez kliknicie w wybranym miejscu i przesuicie palca.
- [accent]Anuluj konstrukcj lub kolekcj [] przez kliknicie X w lewym dolnym rogu.
bundle_pl.properties.text.deconstruction.title: Poradnik niszczenia blokw
bundle_pl.properties.text.deconstruction:
Wybrae [accent]tryb niszczenia blokw[].

Aby zacz niszczenie, po prostu kliknij na blok obok twojego statku.
Kiedy wybrae kilka blokw, kliknij ptaszek i twj statek zacznie niszczy bloki.

- [accent]Anuluj bloki[] z twojej kolekcji przez klikanie ich(?)
- [accent]Usuwaj bloki na obszrze[] przez zaznacznie ich.
- [accent]Anuluj niszcznie  [] przez kliknicie X w lewym dolnym rogu.
bundle_pl.properties.text.sector.abandon.confirm: Are you sure you want to abandon all progress at this sector?\nThis cannot be undone!
bundle_pl.properties.text.name: Nazwa:
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.sectorComplete.text: Your mission is complete.\nThe server will now continue at the next sector.
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.recentKick: Zostae niedawno wyrzucony.\nPoczekaj chwil przed ponownym poczniem.
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.nameInUse: Ta nazwa jest ju zajta na tym serwerze.
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.nameEmpty: Nazwa musi zawiera przynajmniej 1 liter lub cyfr.
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.idInUse: Jeste ju na serwerze! Uywanie tego samego konta na 2 urzdzeniach jest zabronione.
bundle_pl.properties.text.server.kicked.customClient: Ten serwer nie wspomaga wersji deweloperskich. Pobierz oryginaln wersj.
bundle_pl.properties.text.host.info:
Przycisk [accent]host[] hostuje serwer na porcie [scarlet]6567[] i [scarlet]6568.[]
Ktokolwiek z tym samym [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi lub hotspotem[] powinien zobaczy twj serwer.

Jeli chcesz, aby kady z twoim IP mg doczy, [accent]przekierowywanie portw[] jest potrzebne.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Notka:Jeli ktokolwiek ma problem z doczeniem do gry, upewnij si, e udostpnie Mindustry dostp do sieci.
bundle_pl.properties.text.join.info:
Tutaj moesz wpisa [accent]IP serwera[], aby doczy lub wyszukaj [accent]serwery wifi[], do ktrych chcesz doczy .
Gra wieloosobowa na LAN i WAN jest wspomagana.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Notka: Nie ma automatycznej listy wszystkich serwerw; jeli chcesz doczy przez IP, musisz zapyta si hosta o IP.

bundle_pl.properties.text.changelog.error.android: [accent]Notka: lista zmian czasami nie dziaa na Androidzie 4.4 i w d!\nJest to spowodowane przez bd Androida.
bundle_pl.properties.text.changelog.error: [scarlet]Bad w pobieraniu listy zmian!\nSprawd poczenie z internetem.
bundle_pl.properties.text.map.delete.confirm: Jeste pewny, e chcesz usun t map? Nie bdzie mona jej przywrci.
bundle_pl.properties.text.map.nospawn: Ta mapa nie zawiera adnego rdzenia! Musisz doda [ROYAL]niebieski[] rdze do tej mapy.
bundle_pl.properties.text.map.nospawn.pvp: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to spawn into! Add[SCARLET] red[] cores to this map in the editor.

bundle_pl.properties.text.editor.unsaved: [scarlet]Masz niezapisane zmiany![]\nCzy na pewno chcesz wyj?

bundle_pl.properties.text.error.mismatch: Packet error:\npossible client/server version mismatch.\nMake sure you and the host have the latest version of Mindustry!

bundle_pl.properties.item.stone.name: kamie
bundle_pl.properties.item.stone.description: Zwky surowy materia. Uywany do separacji i zamiany w inne surowce lub law. Ju jaskiniowcy go uywali.
bundle_pl.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_pl.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.item.lead.name: Ow
bundle_pl.properties.item.lead.description: Podstawowy matria. Uywany w przesyle przemiotw i pynw. Nie jest on przypadkiem szkodliwy?
bundle_pl.properties.item.coal.name: wgiel
bundle_pl.properties.item.coal.description: Zwyky i atwo dostpny materia energetyczny.
bundle_pl.properties.item.dense-alloy.name: Dense Alloy
bundle_pl.properties.item.dense-alloy.description: A tough alloy made with lead and copper. Used in advanced transportation blocks and high-tier drills.
bundle_pl.properties.item.titanium.name: tytan
bundle_pl.properties.item.titanium.description: Rzadki i bardzo lekki materia. Uywany w bardzo zaawansowanym przewodnictwie, wiertach i samolotach. Poczuj si jak Tytan!
bundle_pl.properties.item.thorium.name: uran
bundle_pl.properties.item.thorium.description: Zwarty i radioaktywny materia uywany w struktucrach i paliwie nuklearnym. Nie trzymaj go w rkach!
bundle_pl.properties.item.silicon.name: Krzem
bundle_pl.properties.item.silicon.description: Niesamowicie przydatny pprzewodnk uywany w panelach sonecznych i skomplikowanej elektronice. Nie, w Dolinie Krzemowej ju nie ma krzemu.
bundle_pl.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastan
bundle_pl.properties.item.plastanium.description: Lekki i plastyczny materia uywany w amunicji odamkowej i samolotach. Uywany te w w klockach LEGO (Dlatego s niezniszczalne)
bundle_pl.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_pl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_pl.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Niezwyky Stop
bundle_pl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_pl.properties.item.biomatter.name: Biomateria
bundle_pl.properties.item.biomatter.description: Zbita organiczna papka uywana jako materia do ropy lub jako podstawowy materia energetyczny. Wegaska!
bundle_pl.properties.item.sand.name: piasek
bundle_pl.properties.item.sand.description: Zwyky materia uywany pospolicie w przepalaniu, stopach i jako topnik. Dostanie piaskiem po oczach nie jest przyjemne.
bundle_pl.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Wybuchowy zwizek
bundle_pl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Lotny zwizek uywany w pirotechnice. Moe by uywany jako materia energetyczny, ale nie polecam. BOOOM!
bundle_pl.properties.item.pyratite.name: Piratian
bundle_pl.properties.item.pyratite.description: Niesamowicie palny zwizek uywany w zbrojeniu. Nielegalny w 9 pastwach.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.water.name: woda
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.lava.name: lawa
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.oil.name: ropa
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_pl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_pl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_pl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_pl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can extinguish fires and heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_pl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_pl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_pl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_pl.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_pl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_pl.properties.block.core.description: The most important building in the game.

bundle_pl.properties.unit.alpha-drone.name: Alpha Drone
bundle_pl.properties.unit.spirit.name: Spirit Drone
bundle_pl.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_pl.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.dagger.name: Dagger
bundle_pl.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.titan.name: Titan
bundle_pl.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced armored ground unit. Uses carbide as ammo. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_pl.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.
bundle_pl.properties.unit.wraith.name: Wraith Fighter
bundle_pl.properties.unit.fortress.name: Fortress
bundle_pl.properties.unit.revenant.name: Revenant
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.
bundle_pl.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall-large.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_pl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_pl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_pl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_pl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_pl.properties.block.smelter.description: Burns coal for smelting copper and lead into dense alloy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.arc-smelter.description: Smelts copper and lead into dense alloy by using an external power source.
bundle_pl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_pl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_pl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solidifer.description: Cools lava to stone at a fast pace.
bundle_pl.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_pl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_pl.properties.block.biomattercompressor.description: Compresses biomatter in order to retrieve oil.
bundle_pl.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_pl.properties.block.centrifuge.description: More efficient than the separator, but also more expensive to build and requires power.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_pl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_pl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_pl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_pl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_pl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_pl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_pl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_pl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_pl.properties.block.dart-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a basic fighter aircraft.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_pl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.command-center.description: Allows changing friendly AI behavior. Currently, attack, retreat and patrol commands are supported.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_pl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_pl.properties.block.alpha-mech-pad.description: When given enough power, rebuilds your ship into the[accent] Alpha[] mech.
bundle_pl.properties.block.itemvoid.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_pl.properties.block.powervoid.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.lava.description: Can be transformed into[LIGHT_GRAY] stone[], used for generating power or used as ammo for certain turrets.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.text.construction.desktop: Desktop controls have been changed.\nTo deselect a block or stop building, [accent]use space[].
bundle_pt_BR.properties.text.construction.title: Guia de contruo de blocos
bundle_pt_BR.properties.text.construction:
You've just selected [accent]block construction mode[].

To begin placing, simply tap a valid location near your ship.
Once you have selected some blocks, press the checkbox to confirm, and your ship will begin constructing them.

- [accent]Remove blocks[] from your selection by tapping them.
- [accent]Shift the selection[] by holding and dragging any block in the selection.
- [accent]Place blocks in a line[] by tapping and holding an empty spot, then dragging in a direction.
- [accent]Cancel construction or selection[] by pressing the X at the bottom left.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.text.deconstruction.title: Block Deconstruction Guide
bundle_pt_BR.properties.text.deconstruction:
You've just selected [accent]block deconstruction mode[].

To begin breaking, simply tap a block near your ship.
Once you have selected some blocks, press the checkbox to confirm, and your ship will begin de-constructing them.

- [accent]Remove blocks[] from your selection by tapping them.
- [accent]Remove blocks in an area[] by tapping and holding an empty spot, then dragging in a direction.
- [accent]Cancel deconstruction or selection[] by pressing the X at the bottom left.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.stone.name: Pedra
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.stone.description: Um Material Incomum Cru. Usado para separar e refinar Em outros materiais,Ou Derreter em Lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.copper.name: Cobre
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.lead.name: Chumbo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.lead.description: Material de comeco basico. usado intensivamente em Blocos de transporte de liquidos e eletronicos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.coal.name: Carvo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.dense-alloy.name: Dense Alloy
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.dense-alloy.description: A tough alloy made with lead and copper. Used in advanced transportation blocks and high-tier drills.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.titanium.name: Titnio
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.titanium.description: Um Material raro super leve, metal usado intensivamente na transportao de lquidos, Brocas e Aeronaves.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.thorium.name: Urnio
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.silicon.name: Slicio
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.silicon.description: Condutor extremamente importante,Com aplicao em paneis solares e dispositivos complexos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanio
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.plastanium.description: Leve, Material dutil Usado em aeronaves Avanadas E munio de fragmentao.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Liga de surto
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.biomatter.name: Biomateria
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.biomatter.description: A clump of organic mush; used for conversion into oil or as a basic fuel.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.sand.name: Areia
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.sand.description: Um material comum Que  usado intensivamente em derretimento, Tanto em ligas como fluxo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Composto de exploso
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Um composto volatil usado em bombas em bombas em explosivos. Enquanto pode ser queimado como combustivel, Isso no  recomendado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.pyratite.name: piratita
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.pyratite.description: Substancia extremamente inflamavel usado em armas incendiarias.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can extinguish fires and heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.dagger.name: Dagger
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.titan.name: Titan
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced armored ground unit. Uses carbide as ammo. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall-large.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.smelter.description: Burns coal for smelting copper and lead into dense alloy.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.arc-smelter.description: Smelts copper and lead into dense alloy by using an external power source.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solidifer.description: Cools lava to stone at a fast pace.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.biomattercompressor.description: Compresses biomatter in order to retrieve oil.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.centrifuge.description: More efficient than the separator, but also more expensive to build and requires power.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.dart-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a basic fighter aircraft.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.command-center.description: Allows changing friendly AI behavior. Currently, attack, retreat and patrol commands are supported.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.alpha-mech-pad.description: When given enough power, rebuilds your ship into the[accent] Alpha[] mech.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.itemvoid.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.powervoid.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.lava.description: Can be transformed into[LIGHT_GRAY] stone[], used for generating power or used as ammo for certain turrets.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
